body.name: Edifier WH700NB Active Noise Cancelling Headphones - 68H Playtime - AI Call Noise Cancellation - Dual Device Connection - Lightweight & Foldable Design - Fast Charge - Bluetooth 5.3 - Ivory
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 14 hrs
features: Enhanced Active Noise Cancellation: Experience advanced multi-mode active noise cancellation designed for both outdoor and indoor environments, including commuting, library, airplane, and subway use. Our ANC technology expertly isolates unwanted noise, creating a serene background for your music.

Superb Sound Quality: Equipped with 40mm dynamic drivers coated in Titanium, the WH700NB headphones deliver deep, impactful bass and crystal-clear high frequencies. Immerse yourself in a captivating listening journey.

Crystal-Clear Call Clarity: Powered by advanced Al algorithms and a single microphone with DNN noise cancellation, the headphones picks up human voice clearly even under noisy conditions. Effortlessly engage in hands-free calls or tele-conferences with impeccable clarity.

Up to 68 Hours Playback Time: Enjoy an impressive playback time of up to 68 hours with ANC off. A 10-minute charge gives you 8 hours of uninterrupted use, ensuring your music keeps pace with your lifestyle.

Fully Foldable For a Comfortable Use: Designed for your comfort, the W700NB headphones boast skin-friendly ear cushions and a soft-toned headband. The foldable and compact design enhances portability, making them your ideal on-the-go companions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Comfortable Noise Cancellation Ideal for commuting / airplanes / subways and others, providing you with a pure music experience. Stay Aware with Ambient Sound Mode Experience the world around you without removing your headphones. Perfect for outdoor activities. Dynamic Sound at Its Best Deliver rich bass and high frequencies. Select from four presets for your preferred sound expression 10 Mins = 8 Hours Up to 68 hrs of playback with ANC off, 45 hrs with ANC on. A 10-minute charge, get 8 hrs of playtime Ergonomic Comfort Designed with your comfort in mind, features skin-friendly ear cushions and an ergonomic headband. Next page 1 Active Noise Cancelling 2 Ambient Sound Mode 3 40mm Dynamic Driver 4 68-Hour Playtime 5 Comfort to Wear

Crystal Clear Call Quality Experience impeccable call quality with enhanced voice pickup and AI enhancement, making hands-free calls and tele-conferences a breeze. Faster Transmission and Stable Connection Equipped with Bluetooth V5.3 Chipset, the WH700NB provides lightning-fast response and unwavering connection stability, enhancing your gaming and binge-watching experiences. Fully Foldable Design Designed to be both lightweight and fully foldable, the WH700NB is your ideal companion for daily use and travel, providing convenience without compromise. Low Latency Gaming Mode Engage in low-latency gaming with just 0.08s delay and improved lip-sync performance. Immerse yourself fully in your gaming world with precise sound cues. Multi-function Buttons Easily control your headphones with physical buttons for functions like play/pause, call management, volume adjustment and others.

Dual Connections Connect to two source devices simultaneously and effortlessly switch between them for various user scenarios. Customizeable App Unlock a range of customizable options through the Edifier Connect App. Control ANC settings, battery levels, gaming mode, tuning modes, and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly Exceptional! Highly Recommended!
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t expect these to be so great. But, they ARE! Love the fact that they are connected to two devices at once, meaning, you have them connected to your computer to watch a movie, but they’ve also connected to your phone. So, you’re watching a movie and a call comes in, you can take it. And when you’re done, the movie returns. This is all transparent and automatic.They sound GREAT. They feel GREAT on your ears for long periods of time.Love that they fold, they charge quickly, and their battery life is tremendous! In realtime experience, I’ve used them for 16 hours continuously, without charging. Extraordinary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Checks all boxes!
reviews.reviewText: These are some sweet headphones, and I own a lot of headphones. Shocked by good build quality. Sound is superb. Plenty of volume and bass. Beautiful balance and tone with a nice Soundstage. Comfort and fit are excellent. Spot on connectivity...Fast. No 3.5 but who cares. They're Bluetooth with over 60 hours of battery. If I want wired I'll head to my amp and get real serious. I got the beige and it's really stylish. I may pop for the grey just for fun. If I'd spent $99 I'd be happy with my purchase. At $40 it's a flat out steal. There's an app, but I haven't bothered. The sound out of the box is muy bien. No EQ. No nothing. Nice job, Edifier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good sound, features I wanted
reviews.reviewText: There are a bunch of these headphones from Edifier and Anker, similarly priced. I compared the features and got what I wanted in this model: they fold, they have ANC, and they have an "ambient sound" setting which amplified the sounds around you so you can be aware of your environment. They have an app for adjustments.The sound might not be "audiophile" level, but they have solid mid bass without losing accurate treble. They get loud enough. No listener fatigue. And they were relatively cheap. It would be nice if the app had an equalizer instead of pre-sets. Happy with them.

reviews.reviewerName: It's really good! First time trying and I love it It's really good! First time trying and I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars sound leaks a lot
reviews.reviewText: good quality headphones. sound leaks a lot which was really upsetting :( noise cancellation is okay too. just know you have to download the app to get easier usage but u dont need to. these are definetly study and at-home headphones unless you dont care about other people hearing whats coming out of your headphones. but if you don't want to annoy the people around you definetly don't get these.....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Very pleased, would recommend for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I’m not an audiophile, but I spent a lot of time browsing and trying to decide which over-ear headphones to get. Since they’re so obvious when you’re wearing them, I wanted ones that fit my style but also didn’t want to settle for rubbish sound or flimsy quality.I’ve had them about 8 weeks now and so far these have been an excellent choice for the price. Easy to use, adequate noise cancellation and incredibly comfortable even for several hours at a time and despite the fact they are slightly too big (I have a small head so most run too big). A negative mentioned by others is the lack of a case but I’ve been folding them and putting them in my bag with other things and they’ve been fine. The sound quality seems pretty good to me, they paired effortlessly with my iPhone and they hold their charge well. When in use there is a flashing indicator which can be a bit distracting if you’re using them in the dark/low light but that’s about the only negative I can find.

reviews.reviewTitle: ANC stopped working in a month.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this on 23rd December, 2023, and today its 31st January 2024. A few days ago the ANC suddenly stopped working and now its basically non existent. It still works a little but it is nowhere near as how it was out of the box. I haven't dropped it or damaged it in any way as one can see in the video I have attached. I have reached out to Edifier customer support but no reply till now. I am hoping for some kind of help from their team.

Ich war auf der Suche nach einer Alternative, die mit den teureren Produkten vor allem in puncto Noise Cancelling mithalten kann. Hier bin ich fündig geworden!Diese Kopfhörer überzeugen zunächst durch ihren klaren Klang. Die Kopplung und Bedienung erfolgt problemlos. Auch das cleane Design und die gute Verarbeitung treten positiv hervor.Das Noise Cancelling hat mich positiv überrascht. Hintergrundgeräusche wie zB Fernseher, Video-Calls und leider auch die Klingel werden problemlos unterdrückt, was ein angenehmes Musikerlebnis ermöglicht.Alles in allem eine wirklich tolle Alternative, die mit teureren Produkten mithalten kann! Ich würde sie wieder kaufen.
